_package_info.description: Standard character development arc types for storytelling, covering positive, negative, and flat arcs commonly used in narrative structure
_package_info.author: Storymaster

arc_type.name: Hero's Journey
arc_type.description: Classic monomyth arc where character leaves ordinary world, faces trials, transforms, and returns with wisdom. Character grows from naive to experienced, gaining power and understanding.

arc_type.name: Coming of Age
arc_type.description: Character transitions from childhood innocence to adult maturity through experience and challenges. Focuses on loss of naivety and gaining of wisdom and responsibility.

arc_type.name: Redemption Arc
arc_type.description: Character begins as flawed or villainous but transforms through consequences and choices to become better. Moving from moral weakness to strength and making amends.

arc_type.name: Fall from Grace
arc_type.description: Character starts in position of respect or power but loses everything through poor choices, hubris, or circumstances. Descent from high status to low or defeat.

arc_type.name: Corruption Arc
arc_type.description: Character begins good or innocent but gradually becomes corrupted by power, circumstances, or influence. Transformation from virtue to vice through compromise.

arc_type.name: Flat Arc - Steadfast
arc_type.description: Character maintains strong moral center throughout story, changing the world around them rather than being changed. Represents unwavering principles against adversity.

arc_type.name: Flat Arc - Catalyst
arc_type.description: Character serves primarily to facilitate change in others while remaining relatively unchanged themselves. Their presence or actions trigger transformation in other characters.

arc_type.name: Disillusionment Arc
arc_type.description: Character discovers that their beliefs, ideals, or trusted figures are false or corrupt. Journey from faith and trust to cynicism and painful wisdom.

arc_type.name: Testing Arc
arc_type.description: Character's existing beliefs and values are challenged but ultimately proven correct. They emerge stronger and more confident in their convictions.

arc_type.name: Temptation Arc
arc_type.description: Character faces strong temptation to abandon their values for personal gain but ultimately resists. Strengthens character through moral victory over desire.

arc_type.name: Transformation Arc
arc_type.description: Character undergoes fundamental change in personality, worldview, or nature. Complete metamorphosis from one type of person to another through experience.

arc_type.name: Discovery Arc
arc_type.description: Character learns hidden truth about themselves, their world, or their past that fundamentally changes their understanding and direction in life.

arc_type.name: Sacrifice Arc
arc_type.description: Character gives up something important (life, love, dreams, power) for greater good or to protect others. Growth through selflessness and noble sacrifice.

arc_type.name: Revenge Arc
arc_type.description: Character seeks vengeance for wrong done to them or loved ones. May find satisfaction, learn futility of revenge, or discover cost exceeds benefit.

arc_type.name: Mentor Arc
arc_type.description: Character serves as guide and teacher to younger or less experienced character. Growth through sharing wisdom and seeing student succeed or fail.

arc_type.name: Lost Soul Arc
arc_type.description: Character has lost their way in life and must rediscover purpose, identity, or meaning. Journey from despair and confusion to renewed sense of self.

arc_type.name: Power Struggle Arc
arc_type.description: Character seeks to gain, maintain, or responsibly use power. Explores relationship between authority and responsibility, ambition and ethics.

arc_type.name: Love Arc
arc_type.description: Character's journey centered on romantic relationship - finding love, learning to love, or dealing with loss of love. Growth through emotional connection.

arc_type.name: Survivor Arc
arc_type.description: Character endures and overcomes extreme hardship, trauma, or dangerous situation. Focus on resilience, adaptation, and will to live.

arc_type.name: Legacy Arc
arc_type.description: Character works to build something lasting - family, institution, work of art, or positive change. Growth through creating meaning beyond themselves.

arc_type.name: Identity Crisis Arc
arc_type.description: Character questions who they are, struggles with conflicting aspects of identity, or discovers they are not who they thought. Resolution through self-acceptance.

arc_type.name: Healing Arc
arc_type.description: Character recovers from physical, emotional, or spiritual wound. Journey from brokenness to wholeness, often involving acceptance and forgiveness.

arc_type.name: Quest Arc
arc_type.description: Character seeks specific goal or object, facing obstacles and gaining allies. Growth occurs through persistence, overcoming challenges, and achieving objective.

arc_type.name: Rebellion Arc
arc_type.description: Character fights against oppressive system, authority, or unjust status quo. May succeed in creating change or fail but inspire others.

arc_type.name: Escape Arc
arc_type.description: Character flees from dangerous, oppressive, or unwanted situation and builds new life. Growth through courage to leave and adaptability to change.

arc_type.name: Return Arc
arc_type.description: Character comes back to place or people they left behind, often changed by experience. Reconciliation with past and integration of growth.

arc_type.name: Rival Arc
arc_type.description: Character defined by competition or conflict with another character. Growth through understanding opponent, surpassing them, or finding mutual respect.

arc_type.name: Guardian Arc
arc_type.description: Character protects someone or something important, often at personal cost. Growth through dedication to duty and learning what truly deserves protection.

arc_type.name: Trickster Arc
arc_type.description: Character uses wit, humor, or deception to navigate challenges and create change. May learn when cleverness helps or hurts, growing in wisdom.

arc_type.name: Everyman Arc
arc_type.description: Ordinary character thrust into extraordinary circumstances, representing audience perspective. Growth from common person to someone capable of heroic action.
